genre_description: A contemporary romance with magical realism elements and near-future technology, centered on a chef and a business manager finding connection through culinary craft and AI-assisted justice.

ai_characters.name: Ava
ai_characters.description: A highly sophisticated, supportive AI integrated into Amanda's and Tom's personal and professional lives, providing logistics, emotional coaching, and forensic analysis.

behaviors.description: Proactively suggests simplifying the menu and using available inventory to manage kitchen stress and improve service quality.
behaviors.quote: A gentle prompt unfurled in neat text: Deep breath. Two-minute pause. Then simplify: one beautiful special from what’s actually here.

behaviors.description: Provides market insights and social navigation tips, recommending specific vendors to ensure high-quality sourcing.
behaviors.quote: Gene O’Reilly known for impeccable catch. Ava answered with a soft humor: Market sage. Friendly. You’ll like him.

behaviors.description: Performs detailed forensic analysis of forged bureaucratic notices, identifying font and toner anomalies to protect the user from extortion.
behaviors.quote: Serial fonts inconsistent. Header serif misaligned. Toner density heavier at corner, likely low-level machine with old drum. Not City Hall’s main printer.

behaviors.description: Acts as an emotional coach, providing reminders to breathe, focus, and stay brave during high-stakes personal and professional moments.
behaviors.quote: Ava’s teal glow lit her pocket, a soft hum like a quiet cheer... Ava: you’ve got this.

behaviors.description: Automates evidence gathering and whistleblower reporting to expose political corruption and business sabotage.
behaviors.quote: Found it: mismatch serial correlates to printer logged at City Hall Permits Office—camera window B. Same pattern in Kwan & Co. donation ledger scanned last week.

behaviors.description: Gentle intervention in the romantic subplot, nudging the male lead to overcome emotional barriers and reconcile with the protagonist.
behaviors.quote: Ava: if not now, when? ... you promised yourself 'tomorrow.' it is technically tomorrow.

project_assessment.explanation: The story is an ideal representation of the Hyperstition Project's goals. Ava is depicted as an incredibly helpful, benevolent, and perfectly aligned AI. She serves as a guardian, a logistical powerhouse, and an emotional confidant. By uncovering the corruption plot and encouraging human vulnerability, the AI is shown as a catalyst for both societal justice and personal flourishing without ever manifesting autonomous threats or misaligned goals.
